Summary: large sphere at altitude moving silently fron ne to sw
divs: Sighting DetailsLarge sphere at altitude moving silently from NE to the SW. Appeared to be reflecting sun light occurred at approximately 10 pm Atlantic Standard Time. Brigth object appears in photo lower right quadrant.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St John
